name: TerraForming
description:
This is just a fun little earthbending inspired prototype, go wild!

The sand colored screen at the start is actually the loading screen, it'll take a little while to load so be patient. After the first time it's loaded it won't take so long anymore.

Controls
A S D W
Walking
Shift + ASDWRunning
SpacebarJumpingLeftclick and drag terrain
Raise/lower pillarLeftclick + rightclick
Change pillar to rockLeftclick drag with white dot pointed at rock
Split rock
Shift hold + leftclick at rocks
Select rocks
Shift hold + rightclick selected rocksLaunch rocks individually
Shift hold + rightclick hold then release rocks
Build strength and launch rocks together
